name: Dictatorship [RUS/ENG]
description:
Description:

You act as a dictator on your personal island. You have to build buildings, set up the economy, create industries and be respected by the people. You must maintain the mood of the inhabitants in order not to be killed. The goal is to die your own death, to die in respect and happiness.
